name: workshop-financial-calculator
description: Workshop Financial Calculator with property-based testing

scripts.protect: npx staticrypt index-unprotected.html -p workshop2024 --short --template-title 'Workshop Financial Calculator' --template-instructions 'Enter password to access the calculator' --template-color-primary '#f59e0b' --template-color-secondary '#18181b' && mv encrypted/index-unprotected.html index.html && rmdir encrypted
